mapper.select: with recursive orgs as ( select ce.uuid, ce.name, ce.type_id, ce.version, ce.parent_uuid, 0 as depth from config_entry ce where ce.uuid = #{uuid} union all select ce.uuid, ce.name, ce.type_id, ce.version, ce.parent_uuid, depth + 1 as depth from orgs join config_entry ce on ce.uuid = orgs.parent_uuid ) select o.uuid, o.name, o.type_id, o.version, null as parent_uuid, cet.id as t_id, cet.code as t_code, cet.description as t_description from orgs o join config_entry_type cet on cet.id = o.type_id where depth = (select max(depth) from orgs)

WITH RECURSIVE orgs AS ( SELECT ce.uuid, name, ce.type_id, ce.version, ce.parent_uuid, 0 as depth FROM config_entry ce WHERE ce.uuid = #{uuid} UNION ALL SELECT ce.uuid, ce.name, ce.type_id, ce.version, ce.parent_uuid, depth + 1 as depth FROM orgs JOIN config_entry ce ON ce.uuid = orgs.parent_uuid ) SELECT o.uuid, o.name, o.type_id, o.version, o.parent_uuid, cet.id as t_id, cet.code as t_code, cet.description as t_description FROM orgs o join config_entry_type cet on cet.id = o.type_id ORDER BY depth DESC;

WITH RECURSIVE orgs AS ( SELECT ce.uuid, name, ce.type_id, ce.version, ce.parent_uuid, 0 as depth FROM config_entry ce WHERE ce.uuid = #{uuid} UNION ALL SELECT ce.uuid, ce.name, ce.type_id, ce.version, ce.parent_uuid, depth + 1 as depth FROM orgs JOIN config_entry ce ON ce.parent_uuid = orgs.uuid ) SELECT o.uuid, o.name, o.type_id, o.version, o.parent_uuid, cet.id as t_id, cet.code as t_code, cet.description as t_description FROM orgs o join config_entry_type cet on cet.id = o.type_id ORDER BY depth ASC;

SELECT ce.uuid, ce.name, ce.type_id, ce.version, ce.parent_uuid, cet.id as t_id, cet.code as t_code, cet.description as t_description FROM working_config_entry wce JOIN config_entry ce ON wce.unit_uuid = ce.uuid JOIN config_entry_type cet ON cet.id = wce.type_id WHERE wce.composite_key like #{key}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO config_entry(uuid, name, type_id, version, parent_uuid) VALUES (#{ce.uuid}, #{ce.name}, #{ce.type.id}, #{ce.version}, #{ce.parentUuid})
INSERT INTO working_config_entry(name, type_id, version, unit_uuid, composite_key) VALUES (#{wce.name}, #{wce.type.id}, #{wce.version}, #{wce.unitUuid}, #{wce.compositeKey})
